lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question, Why is the new house special?
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题，为什么这座新房子很特别？

lyrics.text: I had a letter from my sister yesterday.
lyrics.translation: 我昨天收到了我妹妹的一封信。

lyrics.text: In her letter, she said that she would come to England next year.
lyrics.translation: 在她的信中，她说她明年会来英国。

lyrics.text: If she comes, she will get a surprise.
lyrics.translation: 如果她来了，她会大吃一惊。

lyrics.text: We are now living in a beautiful new house in the country.
lyrics.translation: 我们现在住在乡下的一栋漂亮的新房子里。

lyrics.text: Work on it had begun before my sister left.
lyrics.translation: 在我姐姐离开之前，已经开始了这项工作。

lyrics.text: The house was completed five months ago.
lyrics.translation: 这所房子五个月前就完工了。

lyrics.text: In my letter, I told her that she could stay with us.
lyrics.translation: 在我的信中，我告诉她她可以和我们待在一起。

lyrics.text: The house has many large rooms and there is a lovely garden.
lyrics.translation: 这座房子有很多大房间，还有一个可爱的花园。

lyrics.text: It is a very modern house, so it looks strange to some people.
lyrics.translation: 这是一座非常现代的房子，所以对一些人来说看起来很奇怪。

lyrics.text: It must be the only modern house in the district.
lyrics.translation: 这一定是这个地区唯一的现代房屋。
